fields.name: Planet
fields.description: A celestial body that (a) is in orbit around the Sun, (b) has sufficient mass for its self-gravity to overcome rigid body forces so that it assumes a hydro static equilibrium (nearly round) shape, and (c) has cleared the neighborhood around its orbit.

fields.name: Asteroid
fields.description: Minor planets, especially of the inner Solar System

fields.name: Planetoid
fields.description: Astronomical object in direct orbit around the Sun that is neither a planet nor exclusively classified as a comet

fields.name: Comet
fields.description: Cosmic snowballs of frozen gases, rock and dust that orbit the Sun
